questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: My life in 10 years time, probably on beautifull island in Indonesia with my son. My occupation would be, scuba diving teatcher on a sailboat with friends or family, certainly my son would be dive master too. We would have a house on the beach very closer the sea, with two dogs. That was a beautifull dream, but can be make it happens.
